text: Math 317 Homework 4 1. Find a parametrization for each of the following surfaces. Specify the domain of pa- rameters. (a) the plane through (1, 2, 1) perpendicular to the vector ⟨1, 2, 3⟩. (b) the plane through (1, 2, 1) parallel to the vectors ⟨0, 1, −3⟩ and ⟨−2, 0, 7⟩. (c) the surface S : x2 + 3y + 2z2 + 4 = 0. (d) the part of the sphere x2 + y2 + z2 = 16, x > 2 (use y, z as parameters). (e) the part of the sphere x2 + y2 + z2 = 16, z > −2 (use spherical coordinates). 2. Find an equation of the tangent plane of the surface S = {(x, y, z) ∈ R3 : z3 = xy + yz + zx} at the point (1, 0, 1). 3.
